Article.ArticleTitle: Seroprevalence of neutralizing antibodies against HFMD associated enteroviruses among healthy individuals in Shanghai, China, 2022.

Abstract.AbstractText: • The first report of serological characteristics of HFMD associated enteroviruses in Shanghai after the COVID-19 epidemic. • The seroprevalence of protective NtAbs against Coxsackieviruses was low within the susceptible population of HFMD. • The presence of a silent outbreak and circulation of CVA4 was confirmed among elderly individuals.
